content: this is a 12 crochet block pattern that utilizes an unusual stitch called the wrap stitch which is similar to a cluster but differs in the method of construction this block is the april 2013 designer showcase sampler for melinda miller 1 s afghan cal 2 - please join us 3 many many thanks as always to my fabulous testers marjos debspugs pandastamper tinochka7 and marifly feel free to make as many of these as you like for local craft fairs/auctions/raffles/bazaars but please do not sell finished items online if making for charity please let me know the name of the charity & inwrapude my contact info with the item http //anastaciaknits net if you have any questions or comments or just want to join like-minded souls please join my ravelry group at http //www ravelry com/groups/anastacia-knits-designs thanks 1 http //www ravelry com/stores/melinda-miller-designs 2 http //www ravelry com/discuss/melinda-miller-designs/topics 3 http //www ravelry com/discuss/melinda-miller-designs/2525472/1-25#21
